summary: Adds a hand picked, hand placed secluded new area to Skyrim complete with Manor and Farm.
descriptionHtml:
[URL=http://s1321.photobucket.com/user/bradley_kefford1/media/DCF_zps6818c21b.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1321.photobucket.com/albums/u556/bradley_kefford1/DCF_zps6818c21b.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[youtube]Nvc1TAevcl0[/youtube] [youtube]dkFWH6m1yrw[/youtube]
[youtube]Ecm4MTf0CeA[/youtube]
Deep in the valley, forgotten in time. Lies a peaceful manor given to the local hunters as tribute for Hircine.

KEY IS BY FRONT DOOR

----Description----
Welcome to Peaceful Valley, a hand made new world space sent between Falkreath and Riverwood, in which the goal was to create and out of view area the player could come to, to relax, store items and soak in the views.

I originally decided to come back into modding after a long break, that being said i wanted to throw myself to the limit on my comeback project to create something using all the tricks and skills i had learned over the 2.5 years of doing this. I have combined the vast houses of Morninghood Manor, the outdoor detail of Gleaming Falls and Glorious Ravine the plucked expert skills from learning over time.

I do hope you enjoy this mod and i wish you a great adventure.

---RECOMENDED MODS----

-Climates of Tamriel V3: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?
-AmidianBorn Landscape textures: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37865/?

---Optional Files--
RealVision ENB with Sub surface and Depth of field enabled. <--- for people wondering about my screenshots.


List of features:

-Hand crafted landscape from scratch with great attention to detail and optimisation. Following rules from Bethesda themselves.
-Flora and plants galor, pick and choose from many plants from wheat, all the way upto Nightshade.
-Custom anvil and complete workshop including such things as:
.Tanning rack
.Grindstone
.Workbench
.Smelter
.Anvil
-Completely custom lighting designed for Climates of Tamriel Mod.
-Mannaquins
-Fully functioning non respawning containers for safe storage
-Fully working bookshelfs, a total of 6 for complete book collections!.
-Waterfalls hand picked and placed.
-Ambient sounds and insects fly the area for your pleasure
-Ambient sub cave spa
-Hand placed sounds and music for immersion.
-Place has its own story for lore friendly players!, read note on table by the Manor door.
-Enchanting and Alchemy with nearby storage for all your mystical needs.
-Your very own farm!
-King sized house with a king sized bed!. Complete with Basement and multiple entrances.


Think that pretty much covers it, enjoy your stay at Peaceful Valley :).


Updates:
-V1 Release, feedback awaiting.
author: Countercruel
